00020 
00021         void CLogService::Initialize(const char* execfile, const char* errorfile)
00022         {
00023                 mExecFile = execfile;
00024                 mErrorFile = errorfile;
00025                 ClearLog();
00026         }
00027 
00029 
00030         void CLogService::ClearLog()
00031         {
00032                 std::ofstream ofs;
00033                 ofs.open(mExecFile.c_str(), std::ios_base::out);
00034                 if(!ofs.bad())
00035                         ofs.close();
00036 
00037                 ofs.open(mErrorFile.c_str(), std::ios_base::out);
00038                 if(!ofs.bad())
00039                         ofs.close();
00040         }
00041 
00043 
00044         const char* GetPrefix(LogType type)
00045         {
00046                 switch(type)
00047                 {
00048                 case LogT_TRACE:        return " -TRACE-";
00049                 case LogT_INFO:         return " -INFO-";
00050                 case LogT_WARNING:      return " <<WARNING>>";
00051                 case LogT_ERROR:        return " ===ERROR===";
00052                 default:                        return "";
00053                 }
00054         }
00055 
00057 
00058         int WritePrefix(char *buffer, LogType type)
00059         {
00060                 boost::posix_time::ptime now(boost::posix_time::second_clock::local_time());
00061                 boost::posix_time::time_duration time(now.time_of_day());
00062 
00063                 return sprintf(buffer, "[%0.2d:%0.2d:%0.2d] %s\t",
00064                                                         time.hours(),
00065                                                         time.minutes(),
00066                                                         time.seconds(),
00067                                                         GetPrefix(type));
00068         }
00069 
00071 
00072         void DumpToFile(const std::string& file, const std::string& info)
00073         {
00074                 std::ofstream ofs;
00075                 ofs.open(file.c_str(), std::ios_base::out | std::ios_base::app);
00076                 if (!ofs.bad())
00077                 {
00078                         ofs << info;
00079                         ofs.close();
00080                 }
00081         }
00082 
00084 
00085         void CLogService::Log(LogType type, const char* format, va_list args)
00086         {
00087                 char buffer[MAX_MESSAGE_LENGTH];
00088 
00089                 int pref = WritePrefix(buffer, type);
00090                 int len = MAX_MESSAGE_LENGTH - pref - 1;
00091 
00092                 len = vsnprintf(&buffer[pref], len - 1, format, args);
00093 
00094                 NotifyListeners(type, &buffer[pref]);
00095 
00096                 if(len == -1)   len = MAX_MESSAGE_LENGTH - 2;
00097                 else                    len += pref;
00098 
00099                 buffer[len] = '\n';
00100                 buffer[len + 1] = '\0';
00101 
00102                 DumpToFile(mExecFile, buffer);
00103                 if(type == LogT_ERROR)
00104                         DumpToFile(mErrorFile, buffer);
00105         }
00106 
00108 
00109         void CLogService::Log(LogType type, const char* format, ...)
00110         {
00111                 va_list args;
00112                 va_start(args, format);
00113                 Log(type, format, args);
00114                 va_end(args);
00115         }

00119         void CLogService::AddListener(Logging::ILogListener *listener)
00120         {
00121                 mListeners.push_back(listener);
00122         }
00123 
00125 
00126         void CLogService::RemoveListener(ILogListener *listener)
00127         {
00128                 std::vector<ILogListener*>::iterator it =
00129                         std::find(mListeners.begin(), mListeners.end(), listener);
00130 
00131                 if(it != mListeners.end()) mListeners.erase(it);
00132         }
00133 
00135 
00136         void CLogService::NotifyListeners(LogType type, const char* msg) const
00137         {
00138                 typedef void (ILogListener::*lfT)(const char*);
00139                 lfT fun = 0;
00140 
00141                 switch(type)
00142                 {
00143                 case LogT_TRACE:
00144                         fun = &ILogListener::OnTrace;
00145                         break;
00146                 case LogT_INFO:
00147                         fun = &ILogListener::OnInfo;
00148                         break;
00149                 case LogT_WARNING:
00150                         fun = &ILogListener::OnWarning;
00151                         break;
00152                 case LogT_ERROR:
00153                         fun = &ILogListener::OnError;
00154                         break;
00155                 };
00156 
00157         for(size_t i = 0; i != mListeners.size(); ++i)
00158             (mListeners[i]->*fun)(msg);
00159         }
